title: The Comancheros (Captioned)
creator_credit: Michael Curtiz, George Sherman and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
brief_description: A member of the legendary Texas Rangers works undercover to foil a notorious gang of outlaws in this top-notch Western. John Wayne stars as the two-fisted Ranger heading a cast that includes Stuart Whitman and Lee Marvin. The last film directed by Michael Curtiz “The Comancheros” is a lively, riotous Western with some exciting action sequences. Based on the novel by Paul I. Wellman.
